title: Nursing Practical Competency Enhancement: Learner-Centered Online Mathematics Leadership Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to apply problem-solving skills to real-world tasks through math-based projects.

Learners lead ≥2 monthly project meetings with peer learners (3–5 members) via online collaboration platforms (Teams, Slack, etc.) over a six-month long-term course, achieve ≥4 points on a 5-point scale in communication effectiveness surveys, and accomplish ≥6 of 8 leadership behavior checklist items in collaborative tasks

Learners create four-week self-directed study plans using mobile learning apps (e.g., Medscape, Nursing Central), record learning activities ≥3 times weekly, and achieve ≥4 points in learning effectiveness in monthly evaluation surveys (5-point scale)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
